detaileddescription.para: Method to print out radiation integrals.

parameterdescription.para: Array output of Radation Damping Methods (Approx and Lattice)

memberdef.name: RadiationDampingApprox

detaileddescription.para: Method for calculating approximate radiation integrals. The approximation is due to using ring averages for the bending radius and beta functions.

simplesect.para: Approximate Radiation Damping integrals: $ I_1, I_2, I_3, I_{4x}, I_{4y}, I_{5x}, I_{5y} $
Based on formulas in the Accelerator Handbook for Physicists and Engineers.

detaileddescription.para: Method for calculating element weighted radiation integrals. The integrals are calculated element by element and then weighted with the element's length.

parameterdescription.para: Twiss Table data in Map format.

simplesect.para: Element weighted Radiation Damping integrals: $ I_1, I_2, I_3, I_{4x}, I_{4y}, I_{5x}, I_{5y} $

detaileddescription.para: Method that calculates the radiation damping times, the radiation partition numbers and radiation and quantum excitation equilibria for horizontal emittance, vertical emittance, energy spread squared and bunchlength.
